speaker: Customer Service Agent
dialogue: Understood, you require coverage for additional pet accommodation costs specifically due to a delayed return to Singapore. I have noted that down.

dialogue: Good. One more thing. What if we have to cancel the whole trip *before* we even leave? Say, a sudden serious illness, or a family emergency back here.
